dfsch_object_t* dfsch_regex_compile ( char *  expression,
int  flags 
)

Compile given regular expression into regex object. Flags are same as for regcomp(3).

dfsch_object_t* dfsch_regex_substrings ( dfsch_object_t *  regex,
char *  string,
int  flags 
)

Apply precompiled regex object to given string and return vector of matching substrings (each as vector of start offset, end offset and matching string).
